Uses of Package
vml

  • Classes in vml used by vml 
    Class and Description
    CART.Node
    Internal class for tree nodes
    CARTSettings
    Contains settings for the CART classifier.
    Classifier
    Base class for classifiers.
    Dataset
    Container for datasets.
    DataSource
    Reads comma-separated values (csv) data files into a dataset container.
    DimensionalityReduction
    Reduces the size (number of attributes) for a dataset using Dimensionality Reduction.
    HiddenLayer
    Hidden layer using ReLU.
    Instance
    Hold a data instance (example).
    KernelSettings
    Contains settings for the RBF Kernel classifier.
    KNNSettings
    Contains settings for the k-Nearest Neighbor classifier.
    LSettings
    Contains settings for the Linear Softmax classifier.
    Matrix
    Representation of a matrix.
    Metrics
    Calculates the following performance metrics from evaluating a test dataset:
    - Correctly classified instances
    - Accuracy
    - Precision
    - Recall
    - F-score
    - Confusion matrix
    NNSettings
    Contains settings for the Neural Network classifier.
    OutLayer
    Output layer using Softmax.
    RFSettings
    Contains settings for the RandomForest classifier.
    Vector
    Representation of a vector.
